name: Ultimate Card Games
description: Ultimate Card Games offers a variety of card games, including Hearts, Spades, Bridge, Go Fish, Poker, Blackjack, and much more. You can play your favorite games against AI-controlled opponents or against up to three of your friends via a Game Link cable. If you don't know how to play one of the games, you can watch demonstrations or review the instructions on rules, scoring, and gameplay. You can even create your own character and face with the included Face Creator program.
